alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 27 at 7:09PM MST until August 27 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE AGUA FRIA RIVER REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 707 PM MST, gauge reports indicated flood waters have receded along the Agua Fria River near Cordes Junction, however, these flood waters are still moving downstream toward Black Canyon City this evening. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Agua Fria River. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Agua Fria River. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Black Canyon City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 243 and 245. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Antelope Creek, Agua Fria River, Badger Spring Wash, Bishop Creek, Black Canyon, Silver Creek, Tank Creek, Ash Creek, Larry Creek, Big Bug Creek, Squaw Creek, Indian Creek, Slate Creek and Black Canyon Creek. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Agua Fria River. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
